name: Natural Caramel

instructions.action: Soak Mabroom dates in hot water for 10 minutes to soften
Drain dates but reserve the soaking water
Add dates to a high-speed blender or food processor
Add vanilla extract and sea salt
Blend on high, gradually adding reserved water until smooth and creamy
Add coconut oil if using and blend until silky
Adjust consistency by adding more water for thinner caramel or blending longer for thicker
Store in airtight container in refrigerator

tips: Use as a dip for apple slices or pretzels
Drizzle over ice cream, pancakes, or oatmeal
Spread on toast or rice cakes
Mix into smoothies for natural sweetness
Stores in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
Can be frozen for up to 3 months
Warm slightly before using if it thickens in fridge
